TextLibrary.Text: The Sorcerer lives to fight another day! You must try again.
Darkhunter cunningly leads you through the Skell Marshes until you find the Sorcerer and his Zombie.
You have helped Darkhunter defeat the evil Sorcerer, and you help yourselves to some of his treasure as a reward.
This is a Giant Zombie, and its Battle and Life Points are higher than normal.
